item.title: Goodbye 2020
item.description: Group photo of the New Year’s cards.

item.title: Deep blue sea above the headboard
item.description: Above the bed’s headboard in our bedroom, FC and I currently hang a small painting on the wall. It’s a 50 cm by 40 cm oil painting that I made in 2019. It looks like this: An oil painting by myself (Spree at Night - oil on canvas, 50 cm x 40 cm, link to Instagram) is hanging on the wall above our headboard. About a year ago, we started to have the idea of changing it to a larger painting, which would suit the size of wall better.
